items.title: Google backs $3 billion deal with Bitcoin miner as Big Tech looks to crypto for compute
items.description: Bitcoin miners have increasingly courted AI companies, which require large amounts of computing power to stay competitive.

items.title: Not a single place in the U.S. made the cut for top retirement destinations—but experts warn to weigh these 3 factors before moving abroad
items.description: For those seeking sunshine, safety, and affordability, retiring abroad is more appealing than ever. But you should do your homework first.

items.title: Gen Z is so frugal they’re doctoring ‘heavy sodas’ at gas station fountains throughout the country to make one drink last all day
items.description: The heavy soda hack is being celebrated on TikTok, with users showcasing their creativity and thrift as points of pride.

items.title: ‘The frustration is overwhelming’: Soybean farmers feel betrayed as Argentina blows a hole in rural America’s $47 billion soybean bonanza
items.description: China will reportedly buy at least 10 cargoes of Argentine soybeans, further jeopardizing the U.S. export market, even as Argentina gobbles up Trump s...

items.title: Scott Bessent tells NYC to ‘drop dead’ while he arranges a $20b swap line for Argentina’s chainsaw-wielding, dog-cloning president
items.description: The Treasury Secretary looks at New York and sees a replay of the 1970s. He looks to Trump's ally in Argentina, and sees someone in need of rescue.
